706586f-a.text:
St. Marks Avenue, west from Washington Avenue.

P.L. Sperr
August 28, 1941
706586f-a.folder: St. Mark's Avenue & Washington Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
706586f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: St. Mark's Avenue - Washington Avenue

706587f-a.text:
St. Marks Avenue, east from Washington Avenue. The long building
with the clocktower, is the Knox Hat factory.
View 2 is east from near the factory across Classon Avenue. In
the foreground is Public School No. 42.
P. L.Sperr  August 28, 1941
706587f-a.folder: St. Mark's Avenue & Washington Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
